title: Client Crash during Skin Re-Roll
body:
I re-rolled 3 skin shards and the client crash. I don't have the skin shards anymore.
Is there anyway to see what Skin I got and if I even obtained one?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and found that you unlocked Masked Shaco.  Congrats!  Let me know if this is a consistent issue, and I can help troubleshoot it!
